short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Delete Tweet after Tweet after Tweet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you looking to transition away from X/Twitter? Would you like to delete the content you posted there before leaving? This extension will help you delete all your Tweets, one by one. Log into Twitter, click the button, go get coffee and let it do its thing.
